name: All-Time Battle
description:
Locked in a stalemate war scientist come up with a new plan. Rather then battle over places of land battle over places of when and disrupt the future.

Use a wide array of weapons ranging from the archaic to those ripped right from the pages of scifi. Beam into battle and wage war with up to 16 others from around the globe in skill ranked battles and gather upgrades along the way.

Features
  • 8v8 Battles
  • Skill based matches.
  • Upgradable skill sets
  • Deployable defenses
  • Buy/sell/trade with other players
  • Select a buildout unique to your play style

Will you be a sniper, a medic, a mechanic or something of your own creation?


All items can be unlocked in game via gameplay.
